mainTask.title: HT-023: Agency UI/UX System & Simple Template Engine
mainTask.description:
AGENCY UI/UX SYSTEM: Build streamlined UI/UX system with simple template engine, responsive layouts, and user experience optimization for agency custom micro-app delivery.

**Mission:** Create a practical UI/UX system that enables rapid template customization, responsive design automation, and good user experience for custom micro-app delivery in ≤7 days using AI assistance.

**Scope:** Simple template engine with responsive layouts, basic user experience optimization, accessibility compliance, form builder system, document generation, and essential UX patterns for client micro-apps.

**Methodology:** AUDIT → DECIDE → APPLY → VERIFY with 25+ UX verification checkpoints, responsive design testing, and user experience validation.

**Business Impact:**
- Enable rapid template customization and responsive design for clients
- Optimize user experience for client micro-app end users
- Reduce design and development time for client projects
- Ensure consistent UX patterns across all client deliveries
- Create maintainable template system for agency scalability

**QUALITY ASSURANCE:**

**BUSINESS IMPACT DELIVERED:**

• Production-ready UI/UX system for custom micro-app delivery

- Advanced accessibility system with comprehensive ARIA support
- Screen reader detection and compatibility components
- Advanced keyboard navigation with focus management and trapping
- Color contrast validation utilities with WCAG AA/AAA support
- High contrast mode and reduced motion preferences support
- Skip links and semantic HTML structure validation
- Comprehensive accessibility testing framework with Playwright
- Form accessibility manager with real-time validation
- Brand-aware accessibility policies for consistent compliance
- Accessibility configuration with minimum contrast ratios
- Touch target size compliance (44px minimum)
- Live regions for dynamic content announcements
- Focus indicators and visual accessibility enhancements
